description: This PHP script handles various device control actions such as rebooting, resetting WiFi, factory reset, and user password management based on incoming JSON request data. It defines functions to manipulate device settings via external functions and interacts with device configuration settings.

methods.name: delMacFilterTable
methods.description: Removes MAC filter entries for a specific SSID list and disables MAC filtering on specified access points.

methods.name: delMacFilterTables
methods.description: Calls delMacFilterTable for specific SSID identifiers and triggers an update on WiFi extender status.
